security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill definition. No executable code, scripts, or direct network access. All Stripe operations delegated to official @stripe/mcp server. No concerning capabilities detected.

content.value_statement: Automate Stripe billing operations including product creation, subscription management, checkout flows, and webhook handling. Set up recurring billing, process upgrades, and generate revenue reports.
actual_capabilities: Create and configure Stripe products and pricing tiers
Generate checkout sessions for subscription purchases
Manage customer subscriptions with upgrades and cancellations
Handle Stripe webhook events for subscription lifecycle
Generate billing reports with MRR and churn metrics
Audit Stripe configuration and environment setup
limitations: Requires active Stripe account and API keys
Cannot modify tax settings outside configured AUD/GST parameters
Cannot access payment methods directly without customer context

use_cases.title: Set up recurring billing
use_cases.description: Configure subscription tiers, pricing, and checkout flows for SaaS product with GST-inclusive Australian pricing.

use_cases.title: Handle subscription changes
use_cases.description: Process customer upgrades, downgrades, and cancellations with proration calculations and billing adjustments.

use_cases.title: Generate revenue reports
use_cases.description: Pull MRR metrics, subscription counts, trial conversions, and churn data for business intelligence.

prompt_templates.title: Create products
prompt_templates.prompt: Setup Stripe products and prices for three tiers: Starter, Professional, and Elite with monthly and annual options in AUD including GST.

prompt_templates.title: Generate checkout
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a checkout session for customer@example.com to subscribe to the Professional tier with monthly billing.

prompt_templates.title: Process upgrade
prompt_templates.prompt: Upgrade subscription sub_xxx from Starter to Professional tier, calculate proration, and update the workspace billing record.

prompt_templates.title: Audit configuration
prompt_templates.prompt: Audit the Stripe configuration: verify all products exist, check webhook endpoints, and validate test and live mode environments.

best_practices: Always verify mode (test/live) before processing real payments
Include workspace_id in metadata for multi-tenant tracking
Use idempotency keys for retry-safe subscription operations
anti_patterns: Processing live payments without verifying mode first
Hardcoding Stripe API keys in prompts or files
Skipping webhook signature verification on event handling

faq.question: Does this work with Stripe test mode?
faq.answer: Yes. Supports dual-mode billing with separate test and live keys. Test mode activates for staff emails and internal domains.

faq.question: What currencies are supported?
faq.answer: Configured for AUD with 10% GST included. Can be extended to other currencies via environment configuration.

faq.question: How do I integrate with my existing billing system?
faq.answer: The skill works with @stripe/mcp. Set STRIPE_LIVE_SECRET_KEY and configure webhook endpoints for event handling.

faq.question: Is payment data stored locally?
faq.answer: No. The skill only orchestrates Stripe API calls. Customer and payment data stays in Stripe with metadata linking to your workspace.

faq.question: Why is my checkout failing?
faq.answer: Check mode (test/live) matches your API keys, price exists for the tier, and webhook secrets are configured correctly.

faq.question: How does this compare to Stripe Billing?
faq.answer: This skill wraps Stripe Billing APIs with SaaS-specific logic for tier management, proration, and multi-tenant workspace tracking.
